1.title: Getting Grilled

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Bobby and Damaris combine their love of grilling and barbecues while sharing secrets about backyard entertaining. Then, Bobby makes Mediterranean Grilled Chicken while Damaris adds a sweet spin with her Grilled Citrus Icebox Pie.

2.title: Taste of Home

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Ina Garten joins Bobby and Damaris to make feel-good comfort food. Bobby makes a Red Chile Glazed Meatloaf and Ina joins in with creamy Parmesan Mashed potatoes. Then, Damaris adds to the menu with Barbecue Mac and Cheese.

3.title: Comeback Casseroles

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Damaris aims to convert Bobby into a casserole believer, and she wins him over with a Doughnut Casserole. Then, Bobby makes his Chilaquiles Strata and Damaris whips up a Smokey Chicken, Broccoli Rabe and Wild Rice Casserole.

4.title: All Apples Feast

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Bobby and Damaris start their all-apple feast with Spiced Apple Chips. Then, Bobby creates a savory dish with his Roasted Cider-Glazed Chicken before Damaris gives the menu a sweet conclusion with her Moonshine Sauteed Apples.

5.title: Gaming and Grubbin'

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Dill Benedictine dip; spice-rubbed chicken breast and piquillo white bean hummus; Damaris scores big with her buffalo blue cheese pork wings and a mint julep fruit salsa.

6.title: Any Way You Slice It

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Bobby and Damaris discuss the types of pizza they grew up with before sharing creative recipes likes Bobby's Spicy Margherita Pizza and Damaris' Almond-Chocolate dessert pizza.

7.title: Sweets and Treats

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Black pepper biscuits and cheesy gougeres; Damaris teaches Bobby ratio baking, a simple strategy where no recipes are required; fruit biscuit cobbler; profiteroles; sour cream pound cake.

8.title: Always Time for Tacos

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Talking about everything tacos while enjoying Bobby's seared pineapple salsa and homemade tortilla chips; making tortillas from scratch; Huevos a la Mexicano Tacos with chipotle-honey relish; spicy bean tacos; ice cream tacos.

9.title: Fit For the Day

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Bobby and Damaris share their tips for eating well and feeling great, while enjoying a homemade nectarine rosemary soda; dark chocolate oatmeal; steamed grouper with martini relish; orange sour sauce and a side of crispy couscous.

10.title: Thanksgiving for Two

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Bobby and Damaris sip a seasonal cranberry orange mule cocktail and talk about favorite Thanksgiving memories; Bobby fries a turkey breast and makes some Yukon gold colcannon with sautéed kale, cabbage and bacon butter.

11.title: A Cocktail Party, Y'all

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Bobby and Damaris throw a Southern-style cocktail party; Bobby's mixed nuts; Damaris' salted caramel dipped marshmallows; Katie Lee shows up at the party with her delicious deviled eggs with pickled shrimp and remoulade.

12.title: How About Those Holidays

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Bobby Flay and Damaris Phillips get in the spirit with baklava and Christmas punch, while they reminisce about holiday traditions and memories.

13.title: Something to Brunch On

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Brunch addict Bobby Flay cooks his favorite meal with his good friends Damaris Phillips and Alex Guarnaschelli. They prepare Bobby's steak and eggs, beets and smoked salmon, country ham and smashed potato home fries, and a bourbon cherry toaster tart pie.

-1.title: Episode dated 24 December 2017

episode of.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show (TV Series 2017– )
